profileData.companyDescription: Hams is a 100% Saudi platform that provides comprehensive data protection systems. The company offers specialized services in document management and secure file management, ensuring full compliance with data protection regulations. Hams aims to protect sensitive information from cyberattacks and unauthorized access, offering advanced productivity tools and integrated encryption for local storage.
